name: Ditto Trove
description:
Straight from the world of Tappy Trove, we bring you a new minigame with a retro twist!

You've finished packing your treasure chests, now you have to make it out of the trove alive... but there's a puzzle to solve first.

Watch and repeat the sequence shown by the gems in each round to score points. Will it ends? Who knows, maybe you'll be stuck in the treasure trove forever.
